channel.title: Home on Sushant
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Sushant

item.title: Diminishing capability
item.author: map[username:sushantdhiman host:outlook.com] (Sushant)
item.description: Today with advancement in technology humans have achieved so much. Technology took us to the moon, now we are pushing further into space. We can travel to farthest destinations in matter of hours, which used to took days. Most important advancement has been in the field of communication, If some important incident happens in USA, I will usually hear about it in news, even though there is 12 hour timezone gap.

item.title: Parable of Onion
item.author: map[username:sushantdhiman host:outlook.com] (Sushant)
item.description: Let talk about something spiritual. While browsing Reddit the other day I found a very interesting story that I would definitely like to share. This story is called the Parable of the Onion. The Story Once upon a time there was an old woman who had died and found herself in hell. She complained to Satan that her assignment to the netherworld was a mistake. Satan told her, “You’ve been a greedy, selfish woman all your life.

item.title: About
item.author: map[username:sushantdhiman host:outlook.com] (Sushant)
item.description: Hello there, I am Sushant, currently living in Chandigarh Full stack developer working with Node.JS / React / Sequelize / GraphQL mainly. In past I have used Ember.js / Angular.js / Yii / Laravel to develop many web apps. Member of Sequelize core team. I also contribute to node-mysql2, unexpected.js and other OSS whenever I find some spare time. This is my blog which I use to record things I am currently working on or learning.

item.title: Projects
item.author: map[username:sushantdhiman host:outlook.com] (Sushant)
item.description: List of some open source projects I contribute to Sequelize ORM, Most popular ORM for Node.js Sequelize CLI, The Sequelize CLI unexpected-date, A plugin for unexpected.js for date/time assertions mysql2, Performant MySQL adapter for Node.js with prepared statements unexpected.js, Beautiful Node.js test assertions graphql-sequelize Solid Sequelize + GraphQL support tools
